visual.name: rDataTable
visual.description: Implementation of R 'DT' package in Power BI

settings_rdatatable_params.description: Settings to control the look and feel of R DataTable

method.description: Control the default number of records displayed per page

limitDecimalPlaces.description: Limit decimal places for decimal fields. Not able to obtain user-specified formatting at the field level for R visuals.

fontSize.description: Adjust the font size for column headings and values
